name: Toasted Tours
description:
Toasted Tours was created in a group during Trimester 2 of study at SAE.
The task was to work in a team for a "client" and make an app for the client based of his requests. The intended app game was to market a product.

Team Members:
Art - indiejobbs

Level Design - KCDev

Programming - Chris (Website)

UI - Mercyless
